scripts.build:css: node-sass --output-style compact --indent-type tab --indent-width 1 --source-map dist/map/ -o src/sass/utils/ src/sass/gtris.scss dist/gtris.css
scripts.watch:file: nodemon -e scss,js --watch src -x "npm run build:css && npm run build:js"
scripts.devbuild: npm run lint:sass && npm run lint:js && npm run watch:file
scripts.build: npm run build:css && uglifyjs src/js/util/*.js src/js/components/*.js -o dist/bundle.min.js --source-map dist/map/bundle.min.js.map -p 5 -c -m
